    Game Jams

    Here is some of the game jams I participated in.
    Poutine64

    Prepare and serve poutines to clients.

    I used this game jam as a way to experiement with the Godot game engine.

    Read More 
    Duckys Day Dreams

    A relaxing city builder where you explore different building styles while following funny and whimsical stories.

    .

    Read More 
    Le Petit Pot Jardin
    Read More 
    Shovel Dwarf

    Your character, a dwarf, has to find the exit of each level with the help of power ups.

    My second game jam as the artiste, though I made the ui for the game.

    Read More 
    TurnCraft

    A Turn-based Tactics game where you can only control which team plays when.

    My first solo jam in a while. My ingame art is improving.

    Read More 
    ChatnJudge

    A short story game where you must ask question on a chat room system to uncover a major crime. Is the suspect telling the TRUTH or he DAREd to tell a lie?

    A game made only with ui elements and lot of narrative.

    Read More 
    Pollen Action

    For our FRC betabot 2017 team's strategic planning, I made a game to simulate the competition.

    Read More 
    Orbis

    Alter a groundhog day-like universe to save yourself from an alien-invading-timeline-collapsing-paradox by controlling the very essence of matter itself.

    Is there a pixel on that game that is not changed by a custom shader? I made sur there was none!

    Read More 
    Pilot Wave

    Pilot Wave theory is an unpopular Quantum Mechanics interpretation that says particles and waves coexist. A particle surfs on a wave, and its path is predetermined. Our goal is to test this theory. Bring the particle to the speed of light and see what happens!

    My first game where lot of gfx element are powered with shaders. This started my love of shaders. Also, a really well scoped jam.

    Read More
